channel.title: Taskbar color
channel.description: So you know on windows 7 like when you may be on msn or something and you haven't checked the message the thing on the taskbar is yellow. Where do I change that to a different color? Would love to change that to a red or something.

item.title: Taskbar color
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

probably just a client glitch

and thanks for bumping this I guess lol…still needing this

Read full topic

item.title: Taskbar color
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

This is weird. When I was talking to someone on msn this weird thing happened. Ok so before this happened I had my personalition thing setup and my task bar and window colors were green. Then when I accidentally clicked like 3 times while talking to frell on MSN my task bar when to a solid blue and so did my windows and stuff. I did a system restore because I couldn’t fix it in control panel. How would I fix it in the future if it happens again?

Read full topic

item.title: Taskbar color
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

pidgin seems to take up a lot of memory compared to msn for me for some odd reason. Is there anyway to change a value in the msn client files or anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Taskbar color
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

you mean like the status icon on the taskbar? that’s controlled by msn’s client. you can use pidgin as an alternative - it has GTK skinning capabilities

Read full topic
